newsitem.title: USA: Data I/O sets one million share buyback.
newsitem.headline: Data I/O sets one million share buyback.

text.p: Data I/O Corp said Tuesday its board of directors approved an additional share repurchase program of up to one million shares.
At the end of April the company had about 6.9 million shares outstanding.

Data I/O also said in a statement that it retained investment bank Needham & Co about possible strategic alternatives to enhance shareholder value that might include the sale of one or more divisions of the company, mergers and acquisitions.

The company also said it completed the sale and lease-back of its headquarters. Data I/O will realize about $12 million in cash after costs and taxes. The sale represents an overall pre-tax gain to Data I/0 of about $5.5 million about $2 million of which will be recognized immediately, with the remainder to be amortized over the 10 year life of the lease.
